name: nhanes2015_2016
description: Fields for NHANES data gathered from https://wwwn.cdc.gov/nchs/nhanes/continuousnhanes/default.aspx?BeginYear=2015

fields.name: SEQN
fields.description: (SEQN) Respondent sequence number.

fields.name: gender
fields.description: (DMDHRGND) Household reference person's gender.

fields.name: education
fields.description: (DMDHREDU) Highest education level.

fields.name: size
fields.description: (DMDFMSIZ) Total number of people in the Family.

fields.name: age
fields.description: (DMDHRAGE) Household reference person's age in years.

fields.name: marital_status
fields.description: (DMDHRMAR) Household reference person's marital status.

fields.name: yrs_US
fields.description: (DMDYRSUS) Length of time in US. NA if whole life.

fields.name: vet_foreign_war
fields.description: (DMQADFC) Served in foreign country during armed conflict.

fields.name: veteran
fields.description: (DMQMILIZ) Served on active duty in the U.S. Armed Forces, military Reserves, or National Guard.

fields.name: birth_country
fields.description: (DMDHRBR4) Household reference person's country of birth

fields.name: no_interest_do_things
fields.description: (DPQ010) Over the last 2 weeks, how often have you been bothered by the following problems: little interest or pleasure in doing things?

fields.name: depressed
fields.description: (DPQ020) [Over the last 2 weeks, how often have you been bothered by the following problems:] feeling down, depressed, or hopeless?

fields.name: trouble_sleep
fields.description: (DPQ030) [Over the last 2 weeks, how often have you been bothered by the following problems:] trouble falling or staying asleep, or sleeping too much?

fields.name: no_energy
fields.description: (DPQ040) [Over the last 2 weeks, how often have you been bothered by the following problems:] feeling tired or having little energy?

fields.name: poor_eating
fields.description: (DPQ050) [Over the last 2 weeks, how often have you been bothered by the following problems:] poor appetite or overeating?

fields.name: better_dead
fields.description: (DPQ090) [Over the last 2 weeks, how often have you been bothered by the following problems:] Thoughts that you would be better off dead or of hurting yourself in some way?

fields.name: BP_dr_said
fields.description: (BPQ020) {Have you/Has SP} ever been told by a doctor or other health professional that {you/s/he} had hypertension, also called high blood pressure?

fields.name: age_hypertension
fields.description: (BPD035) Age told had hypertension.

fields.name: prescribed_BP
fields.description: (BPQ040A) Because of {your/SP's} (high blood pressure/hypertension), {have you/has s/he} ever been told to . . . take prescribed medicine?

fields.name: taking_prescribed_BP
fields.description: (BPQ050A) (Are you/Is SP) now taking prescribed hypertension/ high blood pressure medicine

fields.name: prescribed_cholest
fields.description: (BPQ090D) [To lower (your/his/her) blood cholesterol, (have/has) (you/SP) ever been told by a doctor or other health professional]... to take prescribed medicine?

fields.name: taking_prescribed_cholest
fields.description: (BPQ100D) (Are you/Is SP) now taking prescribed cholesterol medicine

fields.name: age_diabetes
fields.description: (DID040) Age told had diabetes.

fields.name: told_prediabetes
fields.description: (DIQ160) {Have you/Has SP} ever been told by a doctor or other health professional that {you have/SP has} any of the following: prediabetes, impaired fasting glucose, impaired glucose tolerance, borderline diabetes or that {your/her/his} blood sugar is higher than normal but not high enough to be called diabetes or sugar diabetes?

fields.name: feel_risk_diabetes
fields.description: (DIQ172) {Do you/Does SP} feel {you/he/she} could be at risk for diabetes or prediabetes?

fields.name: health_insurance
fields.description: (HIQ011) {Are you/Is SP} covered by health insurance or some other kind of health care plan? [Include health insurance obtained through employment or purchased directly as well as government programs like Medicare and Medicaid that provide medical care or help pay medical bills.]

fields.name: medicare
fields.description: (HIQ031B) {Are you/Is SP} covered by Medicare?

fields.name: medicaid
fields.description: (HIQ031B) {Are you/Is SP} covered by Medicaid?

fields.name: no_insurance_1yr
fields.description: (HIQ210) In the past 12 months, was there any time when {you/SP} did not have any health insurance coverage?

fields.name: gen_health
fields.description: (HUQ010) Would you say {your/SP's} health in general is . .

fields.name: gen_health_v1yr
fields.description: (HUQ020) Compared with 12 months ago, would you say {your/SP's} health is now . . .

fields.name: where_healthcare
fields.description: (HUQ041) What kind of place {do you/does SP} go to most often - a clinic, doctor's office, emergency room, or some other place?

options.6: Doesn't go to one place most often

fields.name: how_many_healthcare
fields.description: (HUQ051) {During the past 12 months, how/How} many times {have you/has SP} seen a doctor or other health care professional about {your/his/her} health at a doctor's office, a clinic or some other place? Do not include times {you were/s/he was} hospitalized overnight, visits to hospital emergency rooms, home visits or telephone calls.

fields.name: times_overnight_hosp
fields.description: (HUD080) How many different times did {you/SP} stay in any hospital overnight or longer {during the past 12 months}? (Do not count total number of nights, just total number of hospital admissions for stays which lasted 1 or more nights.)

fields.name: mental_last_year
fields.description: (HUQ090) During the past 12 months, that is since {DISPLAY CURRENT MONTH} of {DISPLAY LAST YEAR}, {have you/has SP} seen or talked to a mental health professional such as a psychologist, psychiatrist, psychiatric nurse or clinical social worker about {your/his/her} health?

fields.name: money_supermarket
fields.description: (CBD071) When you answer these questions, please do not include money spent on alcoholic beverages. During the past 30 days, how much money {did your family/did you} spend at supermarkets or grocery stores? Please include purchases made with food stamps.

fields.name: money_non_food
fields.description: (CBD091) About how much money was spent on nonfood items?

fields.name: eating_out
fields.description: (CBD121) During the past 30 days, how much money {did your family/did you} spend on eating out? Please include money spent in cafeterias at work or at school or on vending machines, for all family members.

fields.name: minutes_vigorous_work
fields.description: (PAD615) How much time {do you/does SP} spend doing vigorous-intensity activities at work on a typical day? (Missing if less than 10)

fields.name: minutes_moderate_work
fields.description: (PAD615) How much time {do you/does SP} spend doing moderate-intensity activities at work on a typical day? (Missing if less than 10)

fields.name: walk_bike_work
fields.description: (PAD645) How much time {do you/does SP} spend walking or bicycling for travel on a typical day? (Missing if less than 10)

fields.name: minutes_vigorous_rec
fields.description: (PAD660) How much time {do you/does SP} spend doing vigorous-intensity sports, fitness or recreational activities on a typical day? (Missing if less than 10)

fields.name: minutes_moderate_rec
fields.description: (PAD675) How much time {do you/does SP} spend doing moderate-intensity sports, fitness or recreational activities on a typical day? (Missing if less than 10)

fields.name: minutes_sedentary
fields.description: (PAD680) How much time {do you/does SP} usually spend sitting on a typical day?

fields.name: hours_TV
fields.description: (PAQ710)  Over the past 30 days, on average how many hours per day did {you/SP} sit and watch TV or videos? (age 2-150)

fields.name: hours_computer
fields.description: (PAQ710)  Over the past 30 days, on average how many hours per day did {you/SP} sit and watch TV or videos? (age 2-150)

fields.name: phys_limit_child
fields.description: (PFQ020) {Do you/Does SP} have an impairment or health problem that limits {your/his/her} ability to {walk, run or play} {walk or run}? (3-19 years old)

fields.name: phys_limit_child_1yr
fields.description: (PFQ030) Is this an impairment or health problem that has lasted, or is expected to last 12 months or longer? (3-19 years old)

fields.name: special_ed
fields.description: (PFQ041) Does {SP} receive Special Education or Early Intervention Services? (3-17 years old)

fields.name: health_prevent_work
fields.description: (PFQ049) Does a physical, mental or emotional problem now keep {you/SP} from working at a job or business? (20-150 years old)

fields.name: health_limit_work
fields.description: (PFQ051) {Are you/Is SP} limited in the kind or amount of work {you/s/he} can do because of a physical, mental or emotional problem? (20-150 years old)

fields.name: confusion
fields.description: (PFQ057) {Are you/Is SP} limited in any way because of difficulty remembering or because {you/s/he} experience{s} periods of confusion? (20-150 years old)

fields.name: health_chronic_1
fields.description: (PFQ063A) What condition or health problem causes {you/SP} to have difficulty with or need help with {NAME OF UP TO 3 ACTIVITIES/these activities}? (20-150 years old)

options.15: Other developmental problem (such as cerebral palsy)

fields.name: health_chronic_2
fields.description: (PFQ063B) What condition or health problem causes {you/SP} to have difficulty with or need help with {NAME OF UP TO 3 ACTIVITIES/these activities}? (20-150 years old)

options.15: Other developmental problem (such as cerebral palsy)

fields.name: health_chronic_3
fields.description: (PFQ063C) What condition or health problem causes {you/SP} to have difficulty with or need help with {NAME OF UP TO 3 ACTIVITIES/these activities}? (20-150 years old)

options.15: Other developmental problem (such as cerebral palsy)

fields.name: health_chronic_4
fields.description: (PFQ063D) What condition or health problem causes {you/SP} to have difficulty with or need help with {NAME OF UP TO 3 ACTIVITIES/these activities}? (20-150 years old)

options.15: Other developmental problem (such as cerebral palsy)

fields.name: health_chronic_5
fields.description: (PFQ063E) What condition or health problem causes {you/SP} to have difficulty with or need help with {NAME OF UP TO 3 ACTIVITIES/these activities}? (20-150 years old)

options.15: Other developmental problem (such as cerebral palsy)

fields.name: Cold_30days
fields.description: (HSQ500) Did {you/SP} have a head cold or chest cold that started during those 30 days? (1-150 years old)

fields.name: GI_30days
fields.description: (HSQ510) Did {you/SP} have a stomach or intestinal illness with vomiting or diarrhea that started during those 30 days? (1-150 years old)

fields.name: flu_30days
fields.description: (HSQ520) Did {you/SP} have flu, pneumonia, or ear infections that started during those 30 days? (1-150 years old)

fields.name: donated_blood
fields.description: (HSQ571) During the past 12 months, that is, since (DISPLAY CURRENT MONTH, DISPLAY LAST YEAR), (have you/has SP) donated blood? (16-150 years old)

fields.name: had_HIV_test
fields.description: (HSQ590) Except for tests {you/SP} may have had as part of blood donations, {have you/has he/has she} ever had {your/his/her} blood tested for the AIDS virus infection? (16-150 years old)

fields.name: body_weight
fields.description: (BMXWT) Weight in kg (0-150 years old)

fields.name: standing_height
fields.description: (BMXHT) Height in cm (0-150 years old)

fields.name: BMI
fields.description: (BMXBMI) Body Mass Index (2-150 years old)

fields.name: hrs_work_wk
fields.description: (OCQ180) How many hours did {you/SP} work last week at all jobs or businesses? (16-150 years old)

fields.name: work_situation
fields.description: (OCQ260) Description of job/work situation (16-150 years old)

fields.name: work_35hrs
fields.description: (OCQ210) {Do you/Does SP} usually work 35 hours or more per week in total at all jobs or businesses? (16-150 years old)

fields.name: how_healthy_diet
fields.description: (DBQ700) How healthy is your overall diet (16-150 years old)

fields.name: Free_meals_sr
fields.description: (DBQ301) In the past 12 months, did {you/SP} receive any meals delivered to {your/his/her} home from community programs, 'Meals on Wheels', or any other programs? (60-150 years old)

fields.name: school_lunch_cost
fields.description: (DBQ390) School lunch free, reduced or full price (4-19 years old)

fields.name: summer_lunch
fields.description: (DBQ424) Summer program free lunch (4-19 years old)
